column1: 19:14|If he'd lived in New York and worked in an office
column2: he might have thrived as the typical
column5: leaving every night on the 7:14 to White Plains
column6: a smudge of lipstick high on his neck
column7: and a tide of lies to see him through to the next day.|The Life and Opinions of Maf the Dog
column8: and of his friend Marilyn Monroe|Andrew O'Hagan
